title: Wednesday Pt1:  Dolphins hope, Devin McCourty, Rodgers vs Brady,  AFC South, and Josh Cribbs!
itunes:title: Wednesday Pt1:  Dolphins hope, Devin McCourty, Rodgers vs Brady,  AFC South, and Josh Cribbs!
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Dolphins hope against the Bills. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty then welcome Devin McCourty to the show to discuss the Patriots facing Lamar Jackson this week.  We preview Aaron Rodgers vs Tom Brady in Week 3 before turning to a difficult start for the AFC South.  Plus, 3x Pro Bowl WR/PR Josh Cribbs drops by to talk Browns and his Hall of Fame hopes.

Stay tuned for Whiteboard Wednesday and Super Bowl Champion Alan Faneca coming in Part Two!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Dolphins hope against the Bills. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty then welcome Devin McCourty to the show to discuss the Patriots facing Lamar Jackson this week.  We preview Aaron Rodgers vs Tom Brady in Week 3 before turning to a difficult start for the AFC South.  Plus, 3x Pro Bowl WR/PR Josh Cribbs drops by to talk Browns and his Hall of Fame hopes.

Stay tuned for Whiteboard Wednesday and Super Bowl Champion Alan Faneca coming in Part Two!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
